Entries.Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey: @, this is my favorite! How did you find one? $h/70, 232, 228, 402, 421, 591, 376/This is an incredible gift! $h/22, 18, 106, 283, 372, -80/Oh, is this for me? I'll just put it over here... $7/346, 459, 197, 426/...Why would you give this to me? Do you need me to put it in the trash? $s/456, 211, 557, 569/Thank you, I could use one of these right now. $k//

Entries.Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey0: I can't believe I am about to be married!$h
Entries.Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey1: I hope I don't get cold feet

Entries.Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoeySupportCareer: Hello @,^Thanks so much for coming to visit me yesterday, and for being there for me. You don't know how much it means to me. I hope to see you again soon.^   -Your friend, Zoey

Entries.1111/f Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 500/t 700: sadpiano/-1000 -1000/farmer 15 14 0 Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 15 6 0/showFrame Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 23/changeMapTile Front 15 4 1453/viewport 15 9/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "Mom... Why do you always have to compare me to Ella? Why can't you consider my happiness?$11#$b#I don't ask for anything from you... Just that you accept me for who I am.$11#$b#*beep beep beep*...Mom?.. Did you hang up on me??.. *click*$11"/faceDirection Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 0/changeMapTile Front 15 4 1454/pause 300/emote Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 12/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 300/move Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 0 1 2/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "Oh... Hello, @.$10"/pause 300/emote Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 28/move Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey -3 0 3/move Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 0 2 2/move Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 1 0 1/move farmer 0 -3 3/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "I guess you overheard.$s"/quickQuestion #Are you okay?#Who were you talking to?(break)speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "*sigh* I've been better. That was my Mom on the phone.$s"(break)speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "My Mom... We aren't on very good terms.$s"/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "My parents have never been proud of me. Growing up, they always compared me to my sister, Ella.$s#$b#She was more successful and got better grades, so my parents always praised her and asked me why I wasn't more like her.$7#$b#I used to try so hard to make them proud. I even went to Law school like they wanted, even though I hated it.$s#$b#I finally dropped out after 3 years of making myself miserable trying to be somebody that I'm not.$s#$b#I moved here and started pursuing my dream of owning a nursery and living in the countryside.#$b#My parents have never supported my decision. My Mom calls me once a week to tell me she's dissapointed in me, and that I should get a 'real' job.$s#$b#Sometimes I wonder if she's right... It's not easy making a living this way. I thought about giving up many times.$7#$b#But I can't imagine doing anything else... Do you think I made the right decision?"/question fork1 "#Yes, you should do what makes you happy. Don't let other people dictate your life.#Your parents are right, you should get a real job."/fork 1111getarealjob/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "Thank you, @. I really needed to hear that.#$b#I'm glad that I opened up to you about this. Thanks for being such a supportive friend.$h"/pause 600/move farmer 0 3 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/mail Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoeySupportCareer/end dialogueWarpOut Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "Thanks so much for being supportive, @."
Entries.1111getarealjob: speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "Oh... I really didn't think you would take my Mom's side on this.$s"pause 100/end dialogueWarpOut Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "...$a"

Entries.1111busstopzoey/f Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoe: none/-1000 -1000/farmer 13 22 0 Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 14 10 2/viewport 12 11 clamp true/skippable/move farmer 0 -10 0 true/proceedPosition farmer/move farmer 1 0 0 false/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "Hey @! I'm so glad you decided to join me today."/faceDirection Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 3/pause 400/faceDirection Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 2/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "Well, we'd better get going."/pause 600/move Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey -2 0 0/move Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 0 -3 0 true/move farmer -2 0 0 true/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 4000/playSound busDoorOpen/pause 3000/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "Okay, we've arrived!$h"/pause 800/changeToTemporaryMap Custom_ZoeysNurseryZuzuSeedShop/viewport -1000 -1000/addTemporaryActor Pierre 16 32 16 6 2/warp Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 16 12/faceDirection Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 0 true/warp farmer 16 13/viewport 9 9 true/move Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 0 -4 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 3000/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "Hello, I'm here to pick up my order."/speak Pierre "Name?"/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "Zoey."/faceDirection Pierre 1/faceDirection Pierre 0/pause 800/faceDirection Pierre 1/faceDirection Pierre 2/speak Pierre "That'll be 2450g"/move Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 1 0 0/pause 1000/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "..."/pause 800/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "Excuse me, but this order is wrong. Where are my sunflower seeds?"/speak Pierre "Sunflower seeds are in aisle 3."/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "...Are you really going to make me find them myself??$a#$b#I'm a loyal customer, I order the same seeds every week, but you still can't get it right.$a"/speak Pierre "Look lady, I don't have time for this.$a#$b#If you want the seeds, you can go get them yourself.$a"/question fork1 "#Hey! Don't you dare talk to my friend like that. If you can't offer us decent service, then we're never going to shop here again!#Zoey, it's okay. Stay here, I'll go grab the seeds."/fork 1111grabtheseeds/speak Pierre "Uh...#$b#My apologies. I'll go get those seeds for you."/move Pierre -8 0 0/pause 1500/move Pierre 8 0 2/pause 800/speak Pierre "Here you go. Thanks for shopping at Seeds and More."/faceDirection Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 2/pause 800/speak Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "Let's go, @. I want to take you to my favorite ice cream shop.$h"/pause 600/move farmer 0 1 2/move farmer 0 4 2 true/move Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey 0 5 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Custom_ZoeysNurseryZoey "Thanks for coming with me today, @."
